article: Last Sunday we had a great trip .My father, my mother and I  went  to summer camp .We went to the mountains .First we  got  to the foot of the mountain  _  bus .In the middle of the mountain there was a river .The water was clean and clear .I washed my face  _  the water .It was warm .There  _  some fishes in the river .In the mountain there were flowers .They were  _  . At noon, many people got together, and they were very  _  We made our meal in the mountain .The food was very  _  , and we liked it very much .After meal ,we went on our trip . We felt  _  . It was really  _  .
